'I would like to congratulate you for the 10 projects you have set up for the # 50 years of Moroccan immigration - it's Belgian!'
'# 50jaar geleden tekenden België in Marokko een akkoord om duizenden werknemers naar yesterday te laten komen' #Bozar
'Thousands of workers from Morocco came to put their arms and talents at the service of our companies' # 50years
'Present on all construction sites, in mines and factories, they helped build our current wealth' # 50years
'They were your parents and your grandparents. You can be proud of them. We can be proud of them! ' #50 years
'In the name of #Belgium, I want to express the gratitude of our country and thank them from the bottom of my heart' # 50years
'Belgians with an immigrant background are still too often discriminated against, for ex. to find a job or housing '# 50years
'The successes of Belgians from immigrant backgrounds are more and more numerous and visible' # 50years
'I appeal to young citizens. Be curious, learn, study! It will not always be easy but hang in there! ' #50 years
'You are not passing travelers in Belgium. It can never be said enough: you are full citizens! ' #50 years
'The #Belgium of tomorrow will be built with you, thanks to you, for you, for your children & for the children of the citizens of our country'
'I encourage you to take your place and invest yourself fully in our society' # 50years
'I bet on our youth to strengthen solidarity and fraternity. We must (re) learn to say we '# 50years
'A us that embraces all citizens, regardless of their origin' # 50years
'In the #Belgium of tomorrow, the one we are building together, there can not be two types of citizens' # 50years
'Together, let's write the new chapters of Belgium!' # 50years #Bozar

You are sending intensive messages about internet law on the agenda.
You have specifically raised objections on two points in your messages. I was essentially aware of the drawbacks to these two points.
As a matter of fact, I have shared my thoughts about these two points by asking them to correct them.
I am pleased to see that concerns about the two items will be resolved tomorrow with a new legal arrangement.
As soon as I returned from Hungary to give this regulation an opportunity to take place quickly, I approved the law in front of me.
I thank our government and the political parties for their understanding. I wish you all a good evening.
